name: Heavy Composite Integration
desc: Reduces the ordnance point cost of large ballistic and missile weapons by %s.
short: Reduces ordnance point cost of large ballistic and missile weapons.

name: Enraged Systems
desc: At the heart of this infernal vessel's unsettlingly advanced technological entrails lie a series of anomalous subsystems, driving its capability for rampant destruction. A majority of these systems operate by capturing energy resulting from overloading starship reactors.

name: Targeting Supercomputer
desc: An extremely advanced targeting array is integrated into this vessel.

name: Invicta
desc: Integrated into the control systems of this colossal vessel, the AI core, Invicta, cannot be removed by any conventional means, short of destroying the vessel.

name: Communications Array
desc: A state-of-the-art hyperwave array is used by this ship to broadcast music at FTL.

name: AI Switch
desc: Overhauls any current automation on the vessel. Installs support for both a dedicated bridge that can contain a captain and their crew, as well as a prototype AI core cradle.

name: Linked Hull
desc: Mirrors certain aspects between the parent and child hulls.

name: Massive Hull
desc: This ship is extremely large, affording both a larger array of sensors and a heavy sensor profile. Increases sensor strength and sensor profile by %s.
